articles.Title: Oil falls after jump in U.S. inventories raises demand concerns
articles.Summary: Oil prices edged lower on Wednesday after an industry group reported a surprising jump in U.S. crude inventories last week, raising concerns about demand in the world's largest consumer.

articles.Title: Oil prices rise 1%, on pace for monthly gain as Israel-Lebanon tensions ...
articles.Summary: Oil prices climbed 1% on Friday, on track for a monthly gain, as tensions between Israel and Lebanon added to concerns about potential supply disruptions in the region.
